name: The Pirate Bay (Ruben Teijeiro)
description:
Simple pirate ship battle game developed as part of a Game Development Course with Godot Engine. The game was developed in 3 days and provides an example of simple game development programming techniques with GDScript.

Credits:
Art: https://kenney.nl

Music:  https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory

Background Sound: https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex

Sound Effects: https://freesound.org/people/istudeny
